articles.description: The two stars have worked together in films like ‘Kick’, ‘Sultan’, and ‘Radhe’, and in a recent interview, Hooda revealed the advise he has been given by Khan
articles.content: Randeep Hooda and Salman Khan have been seen together in three films so far, namely ‘Kick’, ‘Sultan’, and ‘Radhe’. In an interview with Ranveer Allahabadia, Hooda revealed the advise he has been give… [+1811 chars]

articles.author: Shankhyaneel Sarkar
articles.title: ‘Do You Realise Who You Met’: US Envoy Garcetti Says His Staff ‘Went Nuts’ After His Meeting With Shah Rukh - News18
articles.description: Garcetti met Shah Rukh Khan at his residence in Mannat and discussed Bollywood and cricket.
articles.content: US Ambassador Eric Garcetti said that his office staff went berserk and did not believe him in the first place when he said he met Shah Rukh Khan in his Mumbai residence, Mannat, during his first cou… [+2065 chars]
